price: ¿Acaso piensan quienes obran mal que podrán escapar de Mí? ¡Qué mal juzgan!
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن يَسۡبِقُونَاۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna yaʿmalūna al-sayiāti an yasbiqūnā sāa mā yaḥkumūna
